data.name: Ice StationZ - Inferno Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
Inferno Skin Pack.

Tribal Flames mask.
Burnt Amber goggles.
Inferno Jacket (animated).
Blazing backpack (animated).
Hot Lava trousers (animated).
